subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Clúster Marítimo Español (CME) is a not-for-profit corporation that convenes industry, research and educational institutions, innovators, maritime services, and public leaders as trade associations, regional clusters and unions to coordinate the maritime cluster in Spain. The CME is the largest industrial cluster in Spain, both in terms of turnover and employment. 
 
MISSION 
Promote economic growth, employment, productivity, culture, heritage and wellbeing by cultivating a collaborative maritime cluster in Spain. 
Competitiveness, cooperation and communication. These are three principles on which the Spanish Maritime Cluster strategy is based. 
Spanish Maritime Cluster brings together all the joint programs for the Spanish Maritime Sector, such as innovation, technology and international projection. 
 
CME - MEETING POINT 
CME aims to address (but not limited to) the following activities: 
 
•    Shipping 
•    Shipbuilding 
•    Fishing and aquaculture 
•    Ports and maritime services 
•    Logistics 
•    Marine Energy 
•    Offshore activities 
•    Recreational nautical sector 
•    R+D + I activities 
•    Educational and training 
•    Navy 
•    Regional & Local Clustering 
•    Culture and Heritage Promotion 
GOALS 
•    Create a suitable maritime business climate in which the regulatory, legislative and public environment recognizes and supports the social and economic benefits of maritime activities in Spain. 
•    Encourage and facilitate economic development of the Spanish maritime industries 
•    Promote a mature and dynamic maritime innovation ecosystem. 
•    Promote a high skilled workforce 
•    Develop a highly-connected and collaborative cluster 
 
MEMBERS 
 
There are over 75 member companies in CME, approximately, 70% of which are maritime and services companies. The remaining 30% are non-profit, foundations, trade unions or academic organizations. Memberships are only available to organizations, not to individuals.
